SELECT /* IMAQaMapper.selectQaList */ A.QA_SEQ , CT.PARNT_CTGRY_CD , CT.CTGRY_CD , A.TITL , MEM.NAME AS REG_NAME , MEM.REG_ID , MEM.EMAIL , MEM.HP_NO , A.REG_DTM , (SELECT REG_DTM FROM BD_QA_RPLY_DTL RPLY WHERE RPLY.QA_SEQ = A.QA_SEQ) MOD_DTM , A.RSUME_CD FROM BD_QA_MST A JOIN CO_MEM_MST MEM ON A.REG_ID = MEM.ID JOIN BD_QA_CTGRY_DTL CT ON A.QA_SEQ = CT.QA_SEQ WHERE 1=1
LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT /* COGCntsMapper.getQaListCnt */ COUNT(*) FROM BD_QA_MST A JOIN CO_MEM_MST MEM ON A.REG_ID = MEM.ID JOIN BD_QA_CTGRY_DTL CT ON A.QA_SEQ = CT.QA_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT /* IMAQaMapper.selectQaDtl */ A.QA_SEQ , A.RSUME_CD , A.TITL , A.CNTN , A.FILE_SEQ , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DTM , MEM.NAME AS REG_NAME , MEM.EMAIL , MEM.HP_NO , CT.PARNT_CTGRY_CD , CT.CTGRY_CD , RPLY.QA_RPLY_SEQ , RPLY.CNTN AS RPLY_CNTN , RPLY.FILE_SEQ AS RPLY_FILE_SEQ , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = RPLY.REG_ID) AS MOD_NAME , RPLY.REG_DTM AS MOD_DTM FROM BD_QA_MST A JOIN CO_MEM_MST MEM ON A.REG_ID = MEM.ID JOIN BD_QA_CTGRY_DTL CT ON A.QA_SEQ = CT.QA_SEQ JOIN BD_QA_RPLY_DTL RPLY ON A.QA_SEQ = RPLY.QA_SEQ WHERE A.QA_SEQ = #{detailsKey}

AND A.REG_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND (SELECT REG_DTM FROM BD_QA_RPLY_DTL RPLY WHERE A.QA_SEQ = RPLY.QA_SEQ) REG_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND A.REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND (SELECT REG_DTM FROM BD_QA_RPLY_DTL RPLY WHERE A.QA_SEQ = RPLY.QA_SEQ) REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND CT.PARNT_CTGRY_CD = #{inqFir}
AND CT.CTGRY_CD = #{inqSec}
AND (
A.RSUME_CD = #{srcRsumeCd}
)
AND A.TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND MEM.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND MEM.EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND MEM.HP_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND ( INSTR(#{q}, A.TITL) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, MEM.NAME) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, MEM.EMAIL) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, MEM.HP_NO) > 0 OR )
ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
